'''Old Hob''' is a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]] who appears in the market outside of the [[Green Dragon]] Inn in the Extended Edition of ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]''. He was portrayed by [[Tim Gordon]].
